develop: Develop Your Skills in a new and unique way
ensure_bot: to ensure you're not a bot.
protected_page: This page is protected by Google reCAPTCHA
description: Our website is an ideal destination for individuals who want to enhance their skills through practical exercises. We offer a wide range of training programs in various fields. Our website is user-friendly and provides a simple interface that allows you to access the content easily and flexibly.
enter_number: Please enter a number between 1 and 5.
description_one: We provide certified credentials upon successfully completing courses, enhancing job opportunities and personal professional development
description_two: The search feature enables users to easily find relevant courses based on their interests and needs
description_three: The platform enables companies to provide customized training and effectively track participant progress
upload_photo: Upload a photo of your Training
courses_category: Number of courses in a category
manage: Here you can manage your account and view details of the courses you have registered for, as well as the certificates you have obtained
description_zero: Explore the realm of knowledge and gain new skills through our innovative platform for course delivery. Embark on an exciting learning journey and acquire life-changing
check: Please check your emails for a message withe your code .your code is 6 numbers long
comment: I found that this website, which provides practical training, was beneficial and rewarding in enhancing my skills
popular_courses: Provide most popular courses that your want to join and lets start the course for the most simply way in here
agreement: If you purchase the course and cancel it later, 30% of the course price will be deducted. Do you agree?
we_aim: We aim to provide diverse training opportunities to individuals and companies, promote professional growth and societal impact by empowering talent and promoting knowledge exchange
for_companies_description: Major companies register with us in all fields of training. We offer tailored solutions to meet company-specific needs and goals, ensuring high-quality and effective training programs.
for_individuals_description: Easy to browse and save time searching for trainings. Our platform provides a wide variety of courses to enhance personal and professional skills, accessible from anywhere.
our_message_description: To be a leading specialized platform in physical training and to contribute to the advancement of knowledge and thought through the digitization of training. We provide training solutions in all fields through companies that sponsor our students and elevate the training offered by various companies.
our_mission_description: To create an environment characterized by ease and credibility, aiming to enable communication between unified electronic centers that provide value-added services contributing to the development of the training market in Egypt.

connect_skilled_trainers: Opportunity to connect with skilled trainers and other companies for collaboration and networking.

course_approved_enroll: Once approved, it will be available for users to enroll in.

track_employee_performance_of: Yes, you can track the performance of your employees.

analytics_includes: Includes enrollment numbers, completion rates, and feedback ratings.

browsing_and_enrolling: Start browsing and enrolling in courses.
free_courses: Yes, we offer a variety of free courses for individuals.
explore_catalog: Explore our catalog and filter courses by price to find free ones.
course_topics: Courses cover a wide range of topics to enhance skills and knowledge.
track_progress: Yes, you can track your progress on courses you're enrolled in.
my_courses_section: Navigate to the "My Courses" section to see your progress.
certificate_info: Yes, most courses provide a certificate upon successful completion.
view_download_certificates: View and download your certificates from the "Achievements" section in your account.
search_courses: Use the search bar and enter keywords.
use_filters: Use filters to narrow down search results.
save_updates: Make the necessary changes and save your updates.

check_course_details: Check the course details to see if live sessions are available.
message_section_contact: Contact the trainer through the "Messages" section in your account.
payment_methods_depending: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other local payment methods depending on your region.

supported_browsers: Tadrebk supports the latest versions of popular browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
browser_update_info: Ensure your browser is up-to-date for the best experience.
enter_new_payment_details: Enter your new payment details and save the changes.
change_website_language: Yes, you can change the language of the website.
select_language_from_menu: Select your preferred language from the language menu at the top of the page.
learn_about_data_protection: Find detailed information about how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

click_subscribe_button: Click "Subscribe" to receive our latest updates and news.
